A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Visually stunning is the only positive aspect of this movie.  I can't believe that as a lifelong fan I could hate a Star Wars movie\, but here we are.  It seems to me that the New Trilogy\, along with the new Clone Wars and Rebels series\, is nothing more than a shameless money-grab by Disney. As a fan I do not take kindly to this reckless canonical revisionism and am especially upset about how Luke Skywalker's legacy was treated as little more than toilet paper. Shame on Disney and shame on you self-styled fans that enable them.
